VIII.iv.4.B.7.h
.
SMC Under PL 97-306 for Bilateral Blindness With No Light Perception in One Eye
The Veteran is entitled to increased levels of SMC for bilateral blindness with no light perception in one eye.
Note
:
PL 97-306
changed the level of SMC that may be awarded for blindness by equating blindness with no light perception to enucleation of the eye.
Example
:  The appropriate level of SMC for bilateral blindness with no light perception in one eye may be calculated as follows:
5/200 (1.5/60) & NLP = “m,” and
LPO & NLP = “m½.”
